body: Gyunn Gyunn made some of the best Lobelia-san stories, in this certain issue our mischievous master thief impishly talks Erica into stealing her anal virginity, as she was annoyed over Ericas attitude. What a woman. Fun fact: Lobelia-san loves the smell of gunpowder during sex and thus stored a hugh amount of it under her bed, as the smell of gunpowder and thrill of it adds greatly to her enjoyment during sex. Much to Ogamis worries. Again what a woman.
